text: Czarnów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kamienna Góra, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately west of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Czarnow temple.jpg|Hindu temple (2007) File:Czarnów (województwo dolnośląskie) (001) jar.jpg|Houses File:Czarnów (województwo dolnośląskie) (002) jar.jpg|Fountain ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Czarnów, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
